tool_name: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info
tool_description: Search All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info with this api ,search once and get list of all cars. use it for auto-suggestion
title: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info

api_list.name: Search All Cars
api_list.description:
This API will fetch you all cars list, 
If you need bike details change **vehicle_type** from "car" to "bike".

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of all available cars?
I need information on all bike models.
What are the different car variants available?
Please provide a list of all bikes.
Can you fetch all car names and their images?
I want to see all the bike variants.
Show me the complete list of cars.
Get me the details of all available bikes.
What cars are currently available in the market?
List all the bikes with their images.
